name: Sammyyy
wishText: I can write an entire novel about you but it still would never be enough :)
text1: Can you believe it? You are 22??
textInChatBox: A very happy birthday to you, Riju!! Today is your day!!
text2: Wishing you all the love, laughter and success, babe.
text3: Hope you have an amazing year ahead :D
replayText: Aabr dekhte chaile, ekhane click kor
